value.name: Vigil held outside Ohio Statehouse honors George Floyd and others killed by police
value.description: Mohamed Barry, Jason D. White, Kareem Jones: On the steps of the William McKinley statue facing the Ohio Statehouse Tuesday evening lay dozens of broken records, each with the name of a Black person killed by Columbus Police. More than 40 people gathered ...
